column4: Has anyone had any luck installing Oebe Sync (from www.mp3tunes.com) on Ubuntu Edgy?
chatus: eer installed a 64bit edition? half the hardware drivers aren't available, and 32bit programs have to run in a 32bit emulator, so they run slower
seamus: there's not enough 64bit optimized software for linux (or windows) to justify it - I've got a Athlon 64
you mean that its not worth my while getting the 64bit cd
